title: Rohan is walking towards west. He takes three turns while walking, all at an (internal) angle of 45 degree towards right, right and left. What direction is he facing now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Friends…! Rohan is walking towards West  He takes first turn right at an angle of 45 deg., Now he is facing North West, He takes right turn (2nd turn) again at 45 deg, thus he is facing North Now he takes left turn at 45 deg. So now Rohan is facing North-West again. Answer Rohan is facing North West now
